cursor.description: Causes the list of connections to be broken into pages of no more than 5000 IDs at a time. The number of IDs returned is not guaranteed to be 5000 as suspended users are filtered out after connections are queried. If no cursor is provided, a value of -1 will be assumed, which is the first page.

stringify_ids.description: Many programming environments will not consume our Tweet ids due to their size. Provide this option to have ids returned as strings instead.
